document.full_text: to the mournful wail of a lone bagpipe, some of europe's greatest golfers joined family, friends and local residents wednesday at the funeral of seve ballesteros, paying an emotional final tribute to the dynamic spaniard who revived the european game.
document.title: golfers, family gather for ballesteros funeral
lines_and_colors: to the mournful wail of a lone bagpipe, some of europe's greatest golfers joined family, friends and local residents wednesday at the funeral of seve ballesteros, paying an emotional final tribute to the dynamic spaniard who revived the european game.
